body_html:
@vrv Ok I will try. What is desired changeset size?

EDIT: 90 files comes from this commit benoitsteiner/tensorflow-opencl@ecd6f7a . It's due to simple refactoring ot already implemented functionality (moving SYCL registration code at the end of the file instead of between the CPU and the GPU). This apears to by squashed into one massive commit.

Should I create separate pull request for the refactoring commit?
